mdRecord.dcterms:title: Image Orthicon electron tube
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: RCA Corporation [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Image Orthicon camera tube with original factory packaging. Tube has label stating, "Caution, Keep face of this tube up during handling to prevent damage to the light-sensitive surface, 9507." This item was given in honor of Theodore E. Keats, M.D., F.A.C.R., Chair of the UVa Department of Radiology from 1963-1991. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
Donated by Dr. Daniel L. Seale [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--X-rays--Equipment and supplies
